plugin_manifest.name: Suggested Friends Extended
plugin_manifest.author: Nikos Lyberakis
plugin_manifest.description: This plugin helps the users to find people they may know using on several criteria. It is based on Suggested Friends by Matt Beckett (http://community.elgg.org/plugins/869921/1.2/suggested-friends-18x). Initial development of this plugin was funded by Wogker and www.agujero.net.
